text:
Seperti yang sudah kukatakan, suatu hari aku pasti akan gila karenanya.
[redacted_name] kembali bersandar di kepala tempat tidur. Sepertinya dia sangat menyukai ini, yang sebenarnya aku juga suka. Sangat hangat dan dia bisa dengan sempurna menyandarkan dagunya di kepalaku.
"Sakit?" tanya orang di belakangku.
"Hiks, sakit."
"Aku sudah mengoleskan obat, jadi akan segera sembuh. Demammu juga sudah turun." Dia mengoleskan obat...
DIA MENGOLESKAN OBAT DI SANA?!
"Oh, terima kasih."
Tangan itu meninggalkan pinggangnya dan terulur untuk menggenggam tanganku. Aku sangat menyukai tangannya. Maksudku, aku suka melihat tangan kami bersama. Aku memperhatikan cukup lama bahwa Phi Johan juga memiliki tato di lengannya. Tapi aku tidak pernah menyadari kalau itu adalah tato. Apa yang tertulis di sana? Aku baru saja menyadarinya sekarang.
trans:
Like I mentioned before, one of these days, I’m really going to go crazy over this.
[redacted_name] leaned back against the headboard. Clearly enjoying it, and honestly, so was I. It felt so warm, and she could easily rest her chin on my head.
"Does it hurt?" someone asked from behind me.
"Yeah, it does."
"I’ve put some medicine on it, so you’ll be feeling better soon. Your fever has gone down too." She was rubbing the medicine in...
WAIT, SHE'S APPLYING MEDICINE THERE?!
"Oh, thank you."
Her hand slipped from my waist to hold mine. I really liked her hand. I mean it felt nice to see our hands together. I’d noticed for a while that Phi Johan had a tattoo on his arm, but I hadn’t realized it was a tattoo until now. What does it say? Just now, I finally noticed it.
